original_text: And it came to pass at that time when Jeroboam went out of Jerusalem, that the prophet Ahijah the Shilonite found him in the way; and he had clad himself with a new garment; and they two were alone in the field:
korean_text: 그 즈음에 여로보암이 예루살렘에서 나갈 때에 실로 사람 선지자 아히야가 길에서 그를 만나니 아히야가 새 의복을 입었고 그 두 사람만 들에 있었더라

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass at that time
when Jeroboam went out of Jerusalem
that the prophet Ahijah the Shilonite found him
sentences.korean_translation: 실로 사람 아히야 선지자가 그를 만나니

sentences.original_text: and he had clad himself with a new garment
and they two were alone in the field
sentences.korean_translation: 그 두 사람이 밭에서 혼자 있었더라
